TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PipelineColumn extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class is used as a type marker for producing structures for use in the statically typed columnate pipeline building helper API. Users will not create these structures directly. Rather components will implement (hidden) subclasses of one of this classes subclasses (for example, , ), which will contain information that the builder API can use to construct an actual sequence of objects.
